requestBody.title: Validate compliance and credential controls API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Break-glass access logging and review". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Selector types (specific record, credential type, fact requirement)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

resultPayload.note: Compliance controls verified through canonical API endpoint.

data.instruction: Run compliance workflow checks (credential sharing/access control/privacy constraints) for this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Access is scoped correctly and compliance workflow state is traceable in operational records.

resultPayload.note: Compliance controls verified through canonical API endpoint.
